item.title: Cloud Control: Interactive Networks for Audio-Visual Performance with Eric Souther
item.description: This three-hour workshop in West Hall 211 will introduce the node-based programming environment TouchDesigner for creating real-time audiovisuals. The session will begin with a brief introduction to TouchDesigner’s interface and core concepts, followed by a demonstration of my own work created with the platform. Participants will then learn hands-on techniques for mapping data and creating interactive controls for live performance, with a focus on particle systems manipulation. Join 1/28 at 5pm.

item.title: Regeneron seeking nominees for Annual Prize for Creative Innovation
item.description: Regeneron seeks to award creativity and innovation in the biomedical sciences with an unrestricted check for $50,000 and an invitation to present a project at Regeneron’s headquarters. Up to 10 finalists will receive a $5,000 award. Rensselaer will select 2 PhD students and 2 post-docs from any discipline for nomination. Contact this office (madige@rpi.edu) for full details and instructions to submit for the internal selection process. Applications will be due to OGE by February 15th.

item.title: RPI Faculty and Staff In-Person Workshop: Talk Smart, Teach Strong: Sharpening Your Academic Presentation Skills
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, February 10, 2026 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - This session aims to strengthen academic presentation and facilitation skills, combining elements of presentation best practices with effective teaching strategies. You will explore techniques to enhance voice, presence, and impact in the classroom, while also engaging in train-the-trainer methods to foster active student participation. Please register by 2/6 using the Event URL in the See section of the calendar event.
